CustomField.description: /* Shashwat.Nath@Auspost.com has updated the formula to make sure the Active Proposal Button is displayed whenever a new Proposal is created and the Primary Checkbox is false for that proposal . This would only happen if there are multiple proposals linked to same Opportunity and a new proposal would always be created as non Primary . With this change user would have to first make the proposal Active before they can ADD Products to it */
CustomField.formula:
/*IF (AND(LEN(Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__c ) > 0, NOT(Apttus_Proposal__Primary__c),OR( ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c, 'Accepted'),ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c, 'Presented'),ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c, 'Generated'))), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_Proposal__ProposalMakePrimary?id="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/APT_Active1", "Active"),"_self"), NULL)*/
IF (AND(LEN(Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__c ) > 0, NOT(Apttus_Proposal__Primary__c)),HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_Proposal__ProposalMakePrimary?id="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/APT_Active1", "Active"),"_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Active Proposal
